column5: COTY over 4 million shares traded the 1st hour and a half and it was mostly selling 35 since not a lot of conviction from bulls right now
COTY Coty COTY 1351 was the markets top weekly gainer with a 11 jump tickeroncomeventid11422

Good morning Pete MIF Josh bought 100000 shs of COTY earlier this morning Our total combined total stock holdings now are 7627M shares All new purchases this week will be included in stock dividend payment on 06282019

COTY emailed investor relations not that it will do any good and told them that they need to get out there and support their share price with some news This will get shaved at the bid back to sub 12 if they dont
COTY did moosegoose the pumper just become moosegoose the dumper LOL
COTY the CEO owns 3 million shares take that for what you will
